resources.string: This application allows to change the locale (and country) of you device. It is intended to be used to automate tests on devices.

First, grant the application rights to modify your settings with the following command:

 adb shell pm grant com.orange.androidlocales android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION

 To change locale and country, run the following command in your shell:

 adb shell am start -n com.orange.androidlocales/.ChangeLocaleActivity_ -e language fr -e country FR

 This will set the locale to fr_FR (French / France)
Find more info on the github project page
